home.headline: Hi, I'm Mouadh!
home.intro: I'm Mouadh Jeljeli, a 27-year-old web developer based in Tunisia. I specialize in building clean, modern, and responsive web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React. Passionate about great user experiences, I also work with tools like Bootstrap, Tailwind CSS, Next.js, and Node.js. I'm always open to exciting collaborations ‚Äî let's create something amazing together!

crud.title: CRUDS Website + Login (Create, Read, Update, Delete & Search)
crud.description: A CRUD website allows users to create, read, update, delete and search data entries, enabling efficient management of dynamic content.

portfolio.title: Personal Portfolio Website
portfolio.description: A modern and responsive portfolio built with React and Tailwind CSS. Showcases my projects, skills, and contact information with smooth animations and a user-friendly design.

ecommerce.title: MERN Stack E-Commerce Website
ecommerce.description: MERN stack e-commerce app with modern UI and customizable product inventory. Designed for scalability and performance, this platform offers seamless user interactions, intuitive product management, and a responsive experience across all devices.

chat.title: Real-Time Chat App
chat.description: A real-time chat app built with React, Firebase Authentication for Google login, and Firestore for real-time message storage. Users can log in easily with Google, and messages are instantly synced across devices, providing a seamless and dynamic chat experience.
